title: How to deal with feeling awkward when a third person joins the conversation or a friend group - Quora

response.answer_text: I have that problem because I want undivided attention when I’m talking about my feelings or most anything. When3 people are together you can either talk louder and still be ignored or do what I’ve tried is listen and chime along with laughter and short sentences like “yeah I hear ya” or “I feel like that too” it’s when I try too hard to control the conversation is when I get ignored the most. I hope that was helpful if anything you know your not the only one.
